## Instructor

Dr. Kara McCormack (she/her) is a Teaching Assistant Professor at the Department of Biostatistics at UNC-Chapel Hill. Kara's work focuses on (bio)statistics pedagogy, with an emphasis on equitable learning, reproducibility, and promoting diversity and a sense of community in STEM classrooms.
